content: What is the status of this PR? Is the only pending question the issue of whether we want to build the theory of graded algebras on top of a theory of graded rings (proposed here) or just go straight to algebras?
In private discussion with Kevin I think we concluded that @Jujian Zhang is probably going to want graded algebras, so it makes sense to just build those instead.
Fair enough. This PR is still a great example of how to begin building that theory but maybe we should change it's label to take it out of the #queue?
Note that the changes needed amounts mainly to replacing the word add_subgroup with submodule and ring with algebra
